column1: Top Mark's for your climate change efforts & for following #coronavirus #StayAtHome #SocialDistancing protocols.

Cruise lines must cease operations immediately after a returning passenger tested POS to #coronavirus if protection protocols are not being enforced to eliminate spread to the general public. More infections means more time in isolation no money no economy. pic.twitter.com/m5nV2V3Ko8
